verses.verse: Moreover the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thee a great <S%H1419><s%> roll <S%H1549><s%>, and write <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8798><s%> in it with a man's <S%H582><s%> pen <S%H2747><s%> concerning Mahershalalhashbaz <S%H4122><s%>.

And I took <S%H5749><s%> unto me faithful <S%H539><s%> <S%H8737><s%> witnesses <S%H5707><s%> to record <S%H5749><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, Uriyah-yahu <S%H223><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, and Z'kharyah-yahu <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeberechiah <S%H3000><s%>.

And I went <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the prophetess <S%H5031><s%>; and she conceived <S%H2029><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>. Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> to me, Call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8798><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Mahershalalhashbaz <S%H4122><s%>.

For before the child <S%H5288><s%> shall have knowledge <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to cry <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, My father <S%H1><s%>, and my mother <S%H517><s%>, the riches <S%H2428><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%> and the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of SHomron <S%H8111><s%> shall be taken away <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ashur <S%H804><s%>.
The YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> also unto me again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Forasmuch <S%H3282><s%> as this people <S%H5971><s%> refuseht <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Shiloah <S%H7975><s%> that go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> softly <S%H328><s%>, and rejoice <S%H4885><s%> in Rezin <S%H7526><s%> and Remaliah's <S%H7425><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>;

Now therefore, behold, the YY <S%H136><s%> bringeth up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8688><s%> upon them the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the river <S%H5104><s%>, strong <S%H6099><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%>, even the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ashur <S%H804><s%>, and all his glory <S%H3519><s%>: and he shall come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> over all his channels <S%H650><s%>, and go over <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all his banks <S%H1415><s%>:

And he shall pass <S%H2498><s%> <S%H8804><s%> through Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>; he shall overflow <S%H7857><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and go over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, he shall reach <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8686><s%> even to the neck <S%H6677><s%>; and the stretching out <S%H4298><s%> of his wings <S%H3671><s%> shall fill <S%H4393><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of thy land <S%H776><s%>, O `Immanu'EL <S%H6005><s%> <S%H410><s%>.

Associate <S%H7489><s%> <S%H8798><s%> yourselves, O ye people <S%H5971><s%>, and ye shall be broken in pieces <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; and give ear <S%H238><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, all <S%H3605><s%> ye of far <S%H4801><s%> countries <S%H776><s%>: gird <S%H247><s%> <S%H8690><s%> yourselves, and ye shall be broken in pieces <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; gird <S%H247><s%> <S%H8690><s%> yourselves, and ye shall be broken in pieces <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8798><s%>.

Take <S%H5779><s%> counsel <S%H6098><s%> together <S%H5779><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and it shall come to nought <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8714><s%>; speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%>, and it shall not stand <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: for 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> is with us.

For the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thus to me with a strong <S%H2393><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and instructed <S%H3256><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me that I should not walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ye not, A confederacy <S%H7195><s%>, to all them to whom this people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, A confederacy <S%H7195><s%>; neither fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ye their fear <S%H4172><s%>, nor be afraid <S%H6206><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.
Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> himself; and let him be your fear <S%H4172><s%>, and let him be your dread <S%H6206><s%> <S%H8688><s%>.

And he shall be for a sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>; but for a stone <S%H68><s%> of stumbling <S%H5063><s%> and for a rock <S%H6697><s%> of offence <S%H4383><s%> to both <S%H8147><s%> the houses <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, for a gin <S%H6341><s%> and for a snare <S%H4170><s%> to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

And many <S%H7227><s%> among them shall stumble <S%H3782><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and be broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and be snared <S%H3369><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and be taken <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.
Bind up <S%H6887><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the testimony <S%H8584><s%>, seal <S%H2856><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the Torah <S%H8451><s%> among my Talmidim <S%H3928><s%>.

And I will wait <S%H2442><s%> <S%H8765><s%> upon the YY <S%H3068><s%>, that hideth <S%H5641><s%> <S%H8688><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, and I will look <S%H6960><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for him.

Behold, I and the children <S%H3206><s%> whom the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me are for signs <S%H226><s%> and for wonders <S%H4159><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> from the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, which dwelleth <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>.

And when they shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto you, Seek <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto them that have familiar spirits <S%H178><s%>, and unto wizards <S%H3049><s%> that peep <S%H6850><s%> <S%H8772><s%>, and that mutter <S%H1897><s%> <S%H8688><s%>: should not a people <S%H5971><s%> seek <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>? for the living <S%H2416><s%> to the dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%> ?

To the Torah <S%H8451><s%> and to the testimony <S%H8584><s%>: if they speak <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not according to this word <S%H1697><s%>, it is because there is no light <S%H7837><s%> in them.

And they shall pass <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> through it, hardly bestead <S%H7185><s%> <S%H8737><s%> and hungry <S%H7457><s%>: and it shall come to pass, that when they shall be hungry <S%H7456><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, they shall fret <S%H7107><s%> <S%H8694><s%> themselves, and curse <S%H7043><s%> <S%H8765><s%> their king <S%H4428><s%> and their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and look <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upward <S%H4605><s%>.

And they shall look <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto the earth <S%H776><s%>; and behold trouble <S%H6869><s%> and darkness <S%H2825><s%>, dimness <S%H4588><s%> of anguish <S%H6695><s%>; and they shall be driven <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8794><s%> to darkness <S%H653><s%>.
